tool.name: xhmm mergeGATKdepths
tool.description: Merge the output from GATK into a single read depth matrix of samples (rows) by targets (columns)
tool.command:
xhmm --mergeGATKdepths
#if $GATKdepthsSource.GATKdepths == "list": --GATKdepthsList ${GATKdepthsList} #end if
#if $GATKdepthsSource.GATKdepths == "file_path": --GATKdepths `ls -1 $GATKdepthsSource.file_path_name/*.dat | tr "
" "," | sed "s/,$/
/g"` #end if
#if $GATKdepthsSource.GATKdepths == "history": #for $b, $GATKdepth in enumerate( $GATKdepths ): --GATKdepths ${GATKdepth.inputGATKdepths} #end for #end if
#if $GATKdepthsSource.GATKdepths == "preset": #if str($GATKdepthsSource.preset_selector) == "trusightone_female": --GATKdepths `find /home/exacloud/clinical/RichardsLab/ngs/cnv/TruSightOne_FEMALE -type f | tr "
" "," | sed "s/,$/
/g"` #end if
#if str($GATKdepthsSource.preset_selector) == "trusightone_male": --GATKdepths `find /home/exacloud/clinical/RichardsLab/ngs/cnv/TruSightOne_MALE -type f | tr "
" "," | sed "s/,$/
/g"` #end if
#if str($GATKdepthsSource.preset_selector) == "agilentcre_v1_female": --GATKdepths `find /home/exacloud/clinical/RichardsLab/ngs/cnv/AgilentCRE_V1_FEMALE -type f | tr "
" "," | sed "s/,$/
/g"` #end if
#if str($GATKdepthsSource.preset_selector) == "agilentcre_v1_male": --GATKdepths `find /home/exacloud/clinical/RichardsLab/ngs/cnv/AgilentCRE_V1_MALE -type f | tr "
" "," | sed "s/,$/
/g"` #end if #end if
#if $advanced.advanced_selector == "advanced": --sampleIDmap $advanced.input3 --fromID $advanced.input4 --toID $advanced.input5 --columnSuffix $advanced.input6 --rdprecision $advanced.input7 #end if
-o "${outputFile}" 2> "${logFile}"

param.name: dummy_file
param.label: Send a dummy input file, to instruct this process to start.

param.name: GATKdepths
param.label: Select GATKdepths the source for the GATKdepths
param.option: Select a file from history with list of GATKdepths paths

param.name: preset_selector
param.label: Select from one of the preset directories

param.name: GATKdepthsList
param.label: Select file containing list of GATKdepths paths

param.name: input3
param.label: A file containing mappings of sample names \to new samples names

param.name: input4
param.label: Column number of OLD sample IDs to map

param.name: input5
param.label: Column number of NEW sample IDs to map

param.name: input6
param.label: Suffix of columns to be used for merging

param.name: input7
param.label: Decimal precision of read depths output

tool.help:
**What it does**
This tool uses XHMM_ to merge the output from GATK into a single read depth matrix of samples (rows) by targets
.. _XHMM: http://atgu.mgh.harvard.edu/xhmm/index.shtml
------
**Citation**
For the underlying tool, please cite:
Menachem Fromer and Shaun M. Purcell. Using XHMM software to detect copy number variation in whole-exome sequencing data. In Current Protocols in Human Genetics. John Wiley and Sons, Inc., 2014
